question: I have a question.:I have three large spots on my face that get dark.  When every I scrub them they tend to peel off skin or something and it gets lighter, but doesn't completely go away.  I never had this problem before I turned 23 but now it's been like this for over 2 years.  The problem itself isn't affecting me like causing me to get sick but its just something that doesn't look pretty.  I am over weight and my family does have a history of diabetes.  Also, no one else in my family has this problem.  What can it be and how can it be treated.Thanks,Tone
title: Dark Patches on Face
